Package org.apache.fineract.portfolio.loanaccount.exception

  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    ExceedingTrancheCountException  
    InvalidLoanStateTransitionException
    AbstractPlatformDomainRuleException thrown an action to transition a loan from one state to another violates a domain rule.
    InvalidLoanTransactionTypeException
    AbstractPlatformDomainRuleException thrown an action to transition a loan from one state to another violates a domain rule.
    InvalidPaidInAdvanceAmountException
    AbstractPlatformDomainRuleException thrown an action to transition a loan from one state to another violates a domain rule.
    InvalidRefundDateException  
    LoanApplicationDateException  
    LoanApplicationNotInSubmittedAndPendingApprovalStateCannotBeDeleted
    AbstractPlatformDomainRuleException thrown when trying to delete a loan in an invalid state.
    LoanApplicationNotInSubmittedAndPendingApprovalStateCannotBeModified
    AbstractPlatformDomainRuleException thrown when trying to modify a loan in an invalid state.
    LoanDisbursalException  
    LoanForeclosureException  
    LoanMultiDisbursementException  
    LoanNotFoundException
    A RuntimeException thrown when loan resources are not found.
    LoanOfficerAssignmentDateException  
    LoanOfficerAssignmentException  
    LoanOfficerUnassignmentDateException  
    LoanOfficerUnassignmentException  
    LoanTemplateTypeRequiredException
    AbstractPlatformDomainRuleException thrown when not supported loan template type is sent.
    LoanTransactionNotFoundException
    A RuntimeException thrown when loan resources are not found.
    LoanTransactionProcessingStrategyNotFoundException
    A RuntimeException thrown when loan transactions processing strategy resources are not found.
    MinDaysBetweenDisbursalAndFirstRepaymentViolationException
    AbstractPlatformDomainRuleException thrown when a number of days between disbursal date and firstRepayment is less than minimumDaysBetweenDisbursalAndFirstRepayment
    MultiDisbursementDataRequiredException  
    NotSupportedLoanTemplateTypeException
    AbstractPlatformDomainRuleException thrown when not supported loan template type is sent.
    UndoLastTrancheDisbursementException
